tasks.label: LaTeX Build
args: Remove-Item *.pdf -ErrorAction Ignore; pdflatex -interaction=nonstopmode main_temp.tex; bibtex main_temp; pdflatex -interaction=nonstopmode main_temp.tex; pdflatex -interaction=nonstopmode main_temp.tex; if (-not (Test-Path "${workspaceFolder}\zz_pdf")) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path "${workspaceFolder}\zz_pdf" | Out-Null }; Move-Item -Force "main_temp.pdf" "${workspaceFolder}\zz_pdf\"; Get-ChildItem -Include *.aux,*.bbl,*.bcf,*.blg,*.fdb_latexmk,*.fls,*.log,*.lof,*.lot,*.out,*.run.xml,*.toc,*.tmp,*.gz,*.run -Recurse | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction Ignore

tasks.label: LaTeX Clean
args: Get-ChildItem -Include *.pdf,*.aux,*.bbl,*.bcf,*.blg,*.fdb_latexmk,*.fls,*.log,*.lof,*.lot,*.out,*.run.xml,*.toc,*.tmp,*.gz,*.run -Recurse | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction Ignore; if (Test-Path "${workspaceFolder}\zz_pdf\${fileBasenameNoExtension}.pdf") { Remove-Item "${workspaceFolder}\zz_pdf\${fileBasenameNoExtension}.pdf" -Force -ErrorAction Ignore }
